data.quote: I am Thor, son of Odin and god of thunder!
By the power of Mjolnir, I shall protect the realms!
You cannot defeat the mighty Thor!
I will bring thunder and lightning upon my enemies!
The path of a hero is fraught with challenges, but I shall face them with courage!
I am Iron Man. Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist.
Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
I am Iron Man. The suit and I are one.
I've successfully privatized world peace.
Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. Did I miss anything?
Wakanda forever!
In times of crisis, a true king must rise to the occasion.
The strength of Wakanda lies not in its vibranium, but in its people.
I will defend my homeland with every fiber of my being.
My duty as king is to protect my people, no matter the cost.
I'm Star-Lord, man! Legendary outlaw?
I am Groot.
Dance-off, bro! Me versus you!
I have a plan. It's a really good plan. Believe me.
I may not be the smartest, but I'm definitely the coolest.
Dread it. Run from it. Destiny arrives all the same. And now, it's here. Or should I say, I am.
The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
I am inevitable.
The universe is finite, its resources, finite. If life is left unchecked, life will cease to exist. It needs correction.
I know what it's like to lose. To feel so desperately that you're right, yet to fail nonetheless. Dread it. Run from it. Destiny still arrives.
The world is full of heroes. But not all of them wear capes.
Sometimes, the hardest choices require the strongest wills.
I can't control their fear, only my own.
You cannot defeat me. I am the eye of the storm.
I see the future, and it terrifies me.
Forget everything that you think you know.
The bill comes due.
We're in the endgame now.
Time is more valuable than money.
The greatest threat to our universe is our universe.
I've always felt a connection to the chaos within.
No more pretending. No more illusions. Only reality.
I've learned to harness the power within me.
Chaos is my ally, not my enemy.
I am Wanda Maximoff. And I am not afraid.
I can do this all day.
I'm just a kid from Brooklyn.
Lois, if I'm not back in five minutes... wait longer!
I may not be the sharpest tool in the shed, but I'm the most entertaining one!
Why do things today when you can put them off until tomorrow? Procrastination is my middle name!
I don't always make sense, but when I do, it's by accident.
Life is too short to not eat dessert first... and second... and third.
Victory is mine!
What the deuce?
I'm going to do what I do best: lie, steal, cheat, and survive!
I'm not drunk, I'm just exhausted from staying up all night drinking.
I'm a homicidal maniac. They look just like everyone else.
I'm not insane. My mother had me tested.
I'm surrounded by idiots.
Damn you, vile woman! You've impeded my work since the day I escaped from your wretched womb!
Peter, I love you, but you have more nerve than a toothache.
I don't care what other people think. I've always been unconventional, and I'm proud of it.
Being a mother is hard work, but it's the most rewarding job in the world.
Peter, you're like a hurricane of destruction, leaving chaos in your wake.
I may not always agree with Peter's shenanigans, but I'll always stand by him.
Life is too short to worry about what others think. Embrace your quirks and live your best life.
Being a strong woman means standing up for what you believe in and not backing down.
I may seem like the calm one in our family, but deep down, I have a fiery spirit.
Peter, sometimes I think you have a permanent brain freeze from all the ice cream you eat.
Why does everyone always pick on me?
I'm just trying to find my place in this crazy world.
Sometimes I wish I could just disappear and start over.
Being a teenage girl is like being trapped in a never-ending nightmare.
No matter how hard I try, it feels like I'm always the outcast.
I may not be the most popular or glamorous, but I have my own unique qualities.
It's not easy being the black sheep of the family, but I've learned to embrace it.
I may not have it all figured out, but I'm doing the best I can.
Sometimes all it takes is one person to believe in you to make a difference.
In a world that constantly rejects me, I'll keep pushing forward and proving them wrong.
You don't have to win to have fun.
Peter, face it. Without Quagmire, we're boring.
You want me to be the one who says Giggity now?
I might need two weeks off from this friendship.
He's a baby who did a baby thing. Let's all calm down a little.
I was living the life, banging chicks and eating cabbage. You know.
Peter's a good friend. Not like Cleveland.
If cellphones worked, every movie would be two minutes long.
How do you think NBA players get all those chicks? They're all great cooks. Except Kobe Bryant. His secret is different.
I don't want to go to jail, but I really want to take credit.
We can make this work, like couples who meet on Craig's List.
I'm just saying. It's no surprise that justice isn't colorblind.
You're like all the worst parts of a girlfriend.
You know, it's times like this where I think if I didn't talk and you were a normal baby, we wouldn't have any of these problems.
You go ahead, I have to make the waffle fries you scream-requested in the car.
I guess you can call me the Man of La Muncha.
This is why you're so great, dad. You don't pretend to be someone you're not. You don't care what anyone thinks.
I thought you were this wordly, sophisticated guy, but you're just a fraud. Like Moses.
No, but why are you saying the dog's name before dad's?
I'm gonna see which lobster I think deserves to die.
I always knew one day this would happen.
See? We're already making each other better people!
Every Friday night, I'm a clearance-sale area rug.
If I enter Connecticut, I'm entering every state that Connecticut's ever been with. Good luck, brave travelers.
It's creamed corn. I brang it from home because I don't like the creamed corn they have here. It's too crunchy.

I'd be happy to get you an interview. And as a white woman, you'd be the minority here. Unless you're an alcoholic.
Oh, yeah. Black guys put hot sauce on everything on account most of us have been pepper-sprayed by the time we're two.
Your kid's got a walk-in closet?! Two of mine gotta sleep in the car!
I got to email that to Babs. She hates people.
The government wants to tell you how many children you can have!
I lost my home, my money, and perhaps just as serious, my wife left me!
I have seen the rise and fall of civilizations, but nothing prepared me for the chaos of modern parenting.
The saga of fatherhood: once a king, now a chauffeur for a car full of soccer balls and juice boxes.
Oh, hey there Chris! Happy Valentine's Day! Hope Cupid brings you a saggy old bag of treats!
You know Chris, all my life, I've wanted to see you locked in a basement. But now that it's happened, all I want to do is get you out!
Look. Everyone but Chris, keep your pants on and we'll find a way out of this.
Ma'am, I hate to be a nuisance but your son stopped kicking the back of my chair.
I can do this all day.
The price of freedom is high, but it's a price I'm willing to pay.
I'm just a kid from Brooklyn.
I'm with you till the end of the line.
I'm not looking for forgiveness, and I'm way past asking permission.
The world sure seems different from down here.
We need a little less size and a little more urgency.
I've been a scientist for so long, I've forgotten what it's like to be a person.
Pym Particles, Stark. They're the building blocks of the future. They're the key to the quantum realm.
I've got red in my ledger. I'd like to wipe it out.
I've got a very specific skillset. I don't know if you've been in a fight before, but there's usually not this much talking.
I'm not a spy who's pretending to be a waitress. I'm a waitress.
It must be hard to shake the double agent thing. Do you even remember? It's like a dream.
I am Groot.
We are Groot.
I am Groot... again.

On your left.
I'm more than just a wingman.
I do what he does, just slower.
I am the Allfather.
A wise king never seeks out war, but he must always be ready for it.
Whoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor.
We're not the heroes anymore. We're the enemy.
What happens when the Vision is turned back on?
We don't have any weapons.
We never lose our demons, Mordo. We only learn to live above them.
The bill comes due. Always.
